issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

When a SplitWindow changes orientation the title image on the "master window" (if it has been set to have one) will be shrunken to about 1px in width. This happens when the device is rotated from landscape (where the master window is visible) to portrait (where is animated to the closed position).

{html}

comments.body:
{html}

This seems to be a more serious issue than I first realised. There also seems to be some situations in which the master window has resized completely incorrectly. E.g when rotating the master window it can become about half the height and double the width it should be.

{html}
Closing ticket due to the time passed and lack of progress for a number of years. Any problems, please file a new ticket.
